text_block_list.text: One day, while relaxing in my room, I received an e-mail from Thoresen Academy.
Attention all trainers at the Academy! There will be a big announcement concerning your future in the near future.
Be sure to check it out! From Akikawa [Akikawa], Chairman of the Board of Trustees of Tressen Academy."

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Thank you! Media, thank you for coming! Silence! I would like to propose…

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Um, Ms. President～……! If you don't get on the platform to talk, they won't see……!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Mwah. That's right! Lost, lost!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: ―Okay, that's better. Well then, once again!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Proposal! In the name of the chairman of the board of directors of Thoresen Academy, I hereby―

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I declare a new race, "URA Finals" ！！！！
(Zawwah ……!!!)

text_block_list.name: Reporters
text_block_list.text: The "URA Finals" ……! You're creating a new race!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Chairman Akikawa! My name is Fumi Otome of "Monthly Twinkle". May I ask you a question?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Permission! What is it, Otomeishi!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Thank you very much. Now then―

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: I understand that you are establishing a new race.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Fortuitous!! I'm glad you asked!!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: The "URA Finals" is a race that "gives every Uma Musume a chance.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Every Uma Musume will give it their all to reach the top! The best! The top! It's a race where you can compete!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Give…… a chance to…… the top spot…… every Uma girl ……!
(mutter mutter mutter……!!)

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: ……… Huh. Hmmm. Hmmmmmmmmm… ……!!!

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text: Huh! ……! This is getting interesting… ……!
The race, "URA Finals," was suddenly announced. ……
Immediately after the press conference that shocked the racing world, a briefing session was held for the members of Tracen Academy.
We headed to the gymnasium, where the students and trainers had already gathered, and the room was filled with a buzz. ……

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: URA Finals or …… I wonder if it's okay, doing something so big as establishing a new race.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I know……… I mean, she's still a kid, right?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Her predecessor was really good, but it doesn't necessarily mean that her daughter is too.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: ……I'm sorry to interrupt.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: We will have time for questions and answers after the presentation. If you have any questions, please ask then, okay?

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Tazuna, ……! I'm sorry, I'm sorry.
Looking at the surroundings, it seems that people are still more upset and anxious.
In the midst of all this…… finally began the "URA Finals" presentation by Chancellor Akikawa.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Gentlemen! Many of you may have been puzzled and anxious at the sudden announcement of ……

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: But! First of all, listen to me! The URA Finals, and what it means!

text_block_list.name: All
text_block_list.text: Meaning of ……?
The faces of the participants looked at each other in a stir. Then, at the perfect moment, the conversation was interrupted. Akikawa, the chairman of the board of trustees, raised her voice.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Gentlemen. ！！！！

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: ―Have you ever had a frustrating experience?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I want to win the Arimakinen! I want to win the Derby! I want to be the best horse girl! Even if you think so…

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Have you ever had a race where you just couldn't match the distance or course, and you couldn't even show your ability?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: 'My true power, the power of the horsegirl in charge, is not like this,' she bit her lip!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Gentlemen! I am aiming for a world where all Uma Musume who aspire to race will shine!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: The brilliance of the running Uma Musume is a clash of wills! My ideal is for the horsegirls to compete for the top spot with all their might and radiate their brilliance to each other!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: After all! I want to prepare a stage where all the horsegirls can show their best! I want to prepare it!

text_block_list.name: All
text_block_list.text: Chairman of the Board ……

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: In a regular GI, the distance and course are established by the race.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: But―!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Scrape your eyes! In the URA Finals, we will have "all distances" and "all courses"!

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: All distances: ……!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: All courses ……!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: As with the Arima Kinen and Takarazuka Kinen, only the Uma Musume chosen by fan votes will be eligible to participate!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: In other words, the representative Uma Musume who have been active in the Twinkle Series and won many fans―the "Star Uma Musume"―are the only ones who are eligible to run!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Uma Musume, ladies and gentlemen! Run on the stage where you can give it your all, and be the top of the URA Finals!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Why don't you try to win the title of "Finals Champion"?

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Trainers! I want you to develop the talents of the horsegirls in your charge to the best of your ability.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Wouldn't you like to see her crowned the first champion!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Come on! You will all gather fans and become "Star Uma Musume" for the first show of the New Year in three years!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Encouragement! Expectations! I'm waiting for your success!

text_block_list.name: All
text_block_list.text: (Waaaaahhhh ……!!!)
The situation before the briefing changed dramatically, and the room was filled with applause and cheers that did not cease for a while.
Thus, the new tournament to close out the year, the "URA Finals," was declared open!
